meanings.definition: The act or state of diverging.
meanings.sent1: The divergencies in their opinions led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent2: The divergencies in their paths became more apparent as they walked further apart.
meanings.sent3: The divergencies in their tastes for ice cream flavors made choosing a dessert a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The divergencies in their political views created a rift between them.
meanings.sent5: The divergencies in their personalities made them an unlikely pair.

meanings.definition: Differences or variations between two or more things.
meanings.sent1: The divergencies in their test scores were quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The divergencies in their heights made it challenging to take a group photo.
meanings.sent3: The divergencies in their fashion sense always sparked interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: The divergencies in their preferences for music genres were evident during road trips.
meanings.sent5: The divergencies in their approaches to problem-solving complemented each other well.
